articles.title: Earth captures new ‘mini moon’, say astronomers - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The mass -- roughly 1.9-3.5 meters (6-11 feet) in diameter -- was observed by researchers Kacper Wierzchos and Teddy Pruyne at the NASA-funded Catalina Sky Survey in Arizona on the night of February 15.
